title: 5G is coming in Bangladesh
details: 5G is next genration communication system. 5G has landed in Bangladesh! The first commercial 5G network in the country came on-line yesterday. ... Huawei was represented by Simon Lin, President of the Asia Pacific region; Zhang Zhengjun, CEO of Huawei Technologies (Bangladesh) Limited.
